modName: The Mystery of The Artifacts of Sithis
summary: An adventure to gain an epic dagger.
descriptionHtml:
An adventure to gain an epic dagger for assassin type characters. There is a book within the game which is set in SKYEDIT to appear in vendors inventories (vendoritembook). It will explain and show the places that may have the dagger. This mod also includes an enhancement to the thieves guild armor which leans slightly on the god side, as with the weapon. It may not function perfectly if you can\'t find the weapon please PM me (I don\'t want spoilers). The book is called the Book of Secrets. There are also a few new things as a maybe functional poison you may be able to \"cook\". As well as some console only extremely powerfull spells.  The name for the spell is Fury:Blood Magic.

This was all created in skyedit by me as a simple test of a small pre-ck quest. I may remake this with the ck with a tough boss amazing custom weapon model and all and some cool assassin stuff like smoke bombs.
author: Liam Farley
